item.title: Diagram Guide
item.description:
This article offers a sample of basic diagram usage that can be used in Hugo content files.

Please see also Mermaid .

item.title: Image Processing
item.description: This article offers some use cases for showing how to resize and align images.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m developer, programmer, DBA, support IT, for some people I’m kind of IT Shaman, but this website is not about me. I created this website to save my thoughts, someone else solutions, my solutions, what I have learned, some IT Stuff, news, tools, programming, etc. I am not a real expert, I have learned that I still have a lot to learn ! I am not a good writer, and I never will be.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Alert Shortcode
item.description: This article shows how to use the alert shortcode.

item.title: Media Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of media shortcodes, such as Bilibili, Tencent, Youku, iQiyi and Netease Music.

item.title: Online IDE Shortcodes
item.description: A detailed description of online IDE shortcodes, such as JSFiddle, CodePen, JSRun.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
